originalText.text: Dr. Karp is amazing! I have been seeing her since I was diagnosed with scarring alopecia years ago and she goes above and beyond every time I have an appointment to make sure I am happy and we are trying everything possible to keep my hair loss from getting worse. I highly recommend Dr. Karp, she is the best dermatologist I have seen in the city.

text.text: Dr. Karp is amazing! originalText.text:
I have been a patient of Dr. Anna Karp for a few months, and I can confidently say that she is the best dermatologist I have ever been to (and I have been going for different derms for 10 years). Dr. Karp's expertise and genuine care for her patients are truly remarkable. Her diagnostic skills are impeccable, and she always takes the time to explain procedures and treatment plans in a way that is easy to understand.

What sets Dr. Karp apart is her compassionate approach to dermatology. She listens attentively to her patients' concerns and goes above and beyond to ensure they feel comfortable and well-informed. The personalized attention I receive at every visit makes me feel valued as a patient.

The staff at Dr. Karp's office is friendly, efficient, and always willing to help. Scheduling appointments is hassle-free, and I appreciate the punctuality of the clinic. The environment is clean, welcoming, and conducive to a positive healthcare experience.

I have recommended her a ton of my friends and they all love her, too. Thank you, Dr. Karp!!!!

originalText.text: Dr . Anna Karp is amazing and one of the best dermatologists in the city . Went there for a small procedure and nothing but excellent experience and amazing results. Highly recommended her if your looking for a dermatologist in nyc .

text.text: Dr . Anna Karp is amazing and one of the best dermatologists in the city . Went there for a small procedure and nothing but excellent experience and amazing results. Highly recommended her if your looking for a dermatologist in nyc .

originalText.text: Dr. Anna Karp is the best of the best! After a 10+ year struggle with acne, trying every product in the book and seeing a handful of dermatologists, I finally found my way here to Dr. Karp. She listened to my needs and developed the best plan of action for me. My skin looks better now than it has ever looked in my entire life. Not only am I looking my best but I am feeling my best because Dr. Karp helped me regain my confidence back. Cannot recommend her enough if you are looking for a dermatologist in the NYC area!

text.text: Dr. Anna Karp is the best of the best! originalText.text: I found SINY Dermatology by looking for better skin treatments, since no treatment seemed to be working for my skin condition. This is when I met Dr. Karp and her staff, which were extremely kind and professional. They use the best treatments in the market and are very thorough when explaining the treatments. Needless to say, my skin has gotten much better and almost fully recover from my skin condition. I highly recommend to visit SINY Dermatology, and specially Dr. Karp, if one has any concerns regarding your skin or dermatology in general. She always goes above and beyond for her patients and provides the best quality of service. All in all, if you also feel that no skin treatment is working, Dr. Karp is the right person for the job and with her knowledge and expertise in the field, she will find the right treatment/product for you.
